DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Reduce the effect of this card for each card remaining in your draw pile.
Cards from any and ALL Colors.
The following Effects: Strength Down, Shackled, Dexterity Down, Buffer Down, Retain Cards This Turn, Blur, Thorns Down
